main event: A civilian witnessed a white, football-shaped UFO in Saugerties, New York, for 1 hour and 30 minutes on January 16, 1966.
interesting points: The observer saw one large object and possibly three smaller objects that moved off from it,The sighting occurred at 30 degrees elevation in the Northeast and the object disappeared to the West,The object was initially drawn to attention by its brightness and movement,The clear weather conditions allowed for a good view with 12 miles visibility,The sighting was confirmed by two New York State Police patrolmen.
